short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate customizable QR codes with advanced features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Advanced QR Code Generator is a Chrome extension that allows users to quickly create customizable QR codes directly from their browser. Key features include:

• Generate QR codes for any text or URL
• Customize QR code appearance with color options
• Choose error correction levels for optimal scanning
• Easily download generated QR codes as PNG images
• View and regenerate recent QR code history

This extension is ideal for anyone who frequently needs to create QR codes for personal or professional use. It streamlines the QR code generation process, eliminating the need to use external websites or applications. With its advanced customization options and user-friendly interface, it's perfect for marketers, educators, event organizers, or anyone looking to share information efficiently through QR codes.
